
\documentclass[border={10pt 10pt 10pt 10pt},varwidth]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsmath}
\usepackage{tikz-cd,tikz-3dplot} 
\usetikzlibrary{calc,intersections,through,backgrounds,decorations.pathmorphing, decorations.shapes,decorations.markings,patterns}
%include other needed packages here   
\usepackage{xcolor}

\DeclareMathOperator{\Flagd}{\operatorname{Flag}_{d}}
\DeclareMathOperator{\Flagdstr}{\operatorname{Flag}_{d,str}}
\newcommand{\Gr}{\operatorname{Gr}}
\newcommand{\Grr}{\operatorname{Gr}}
\newcommand{\Gralg}[1]{\operatorname{Gr}^{#1}}
\newcommand{\Grq}{\operatorname{Gr}^{KQ}}
\newcommand{\Flag}[1]{\operatorname{Flag}_{#1}}
\newcommand{\Flagstr}[1]{\operatorname{Flag}_{#1,str}}
\makeatletter
\newcommand\xleftrightarrow[2][]{%
  \ext@arrow 9999{\longleftrightarrowfill@}{#1}{#2}}
\newcommand\longleftrightarrowfill@{%
  \arrowfill@\leftarrow\relbar\rightarrow}
\makeatother
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/?
\definecolor{ashgrey}{rgb}{0.7, 0.75, 0.71}
\definecolor{realblack}{rgb}{0, 0, 0}
\tikzcdset{arrow style={tikz},
           diagrams={>=Classical TikZ Rightarrow,shorten <=-2pt,shorten >=-2pt,},
           normal/.style={realblack},
           mark/.style={red},
           ignore/.style={dashed},
           secondstep/.style={blue,dashed},
           thirdstep/.style={orange,dashed},
           }
\[\begin{tikzcd}[row sep={5mm,between origins},column sep={5mm,between origins},color=ashgrey,cramped]
{\phantom{G/H}}&&&&&& {\phantom{G/H}} \\
&&&&&& {} \\
&&&&&& |[label={[black]center:C}]|{} \\
&&&&&& {} \\
	&&&& 1 && |[label={[black]center:B}]| \\
	&&& 1 & |[label={[black]center:T}]|1 & 1 \\
	|[label={[black]center:A}]|{}&& 1 && 2 && 1 \\
	& |[label={[black]center:N}]|1 && 2 & 1 & 2 \\
	1 && |[label={[black]center:M}]|2 && 3 && 1 \\
	& 2 && 3 & 2 & 2 \\
	|[label={[black]center:M/N}]|1 && 3 && 4 && 1 \\
	& 2 && 4 & 2 & |[label={[black]center:\tau X_1}]|3 \\
	1 && 3 && 5 && |[label={[red]center:X}]|2 \\
	& 2 && 4 & |[label={[black]center:\tau Y}]|3 & |[label={[black]center:X_1}]|4 \\
	1 && 3 && 6 && 2 \\
	& 2 && 5 & |[label={[red]center:Y}]|3 &  4 \\
	1 && 4 && 6 && 2 \\
	& 3 && 5 & 3 & 4 \\
	2 && 4 && 6 && 2 \\
	& 3 && 5 & 3 & 4 \\
	|[label={[red]center:S}]|1 && 4 && 6 && 2 \\
	& 2 && 5 & 3 & 4 \\
	1 && 3 && 6 && 2 \\
	& 2 && 4 & 3 & 4 \\
	1 && 3 && 5 && 2 \\
	& 2 && 4 & 2 & 3 \\
	1 && 3 && 4 && 1 \\
	& 2 && 3 & 2 & 2 \\
	1 && 2 && 3 && 1 \\
	& 1 && 2 & 1 & 2 \\
	&& 1 && 2 && 1 \\
	&&& 1 & 1 & 1 \\
	&&&& 1
		\arrow[from=7-1, to=8-2,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=8-2, to=9-3,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=9-3, to=10-4,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=10-4, to=11-5,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=11-5, to=12-6,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=12-6, to=13-7,normal,ignore]
		\arrow[from=12-6, to=13-5,normal]
		\arrow[from=13-5, to=14-5,normal]
		\arrow[from=13-7, to=14-6,mark]
		\arrow[from=14-6, to=15-5,mark]
		\arrow[from=15-5, to=16-5,mark]
		\arrow[from=6-5, to=7-5,secondstep]
		\arrow[from=7-5, to=8-4,secondstep]
		\arrow[from=8-4, to=9-3,secondstep]
		\arrow[from=9-3, to=10-2,secondstep]
		\arrow[from=10-2, to=11-1,secondstep]
\end{tikzcd}\]
\end{document}
